level.heading: Sales and transfers prohibited.
level.text: No person or organization shall sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of any firearm, destructive device or ammunition in the District except as provided in § 7-2502.10(c), § 7-2505.02, or § 7-2507.05.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-2501.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-62
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-62, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-2501.01.
